variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: action
variable.description: MethodBinding representing the application action to invoke when this component is activated by the user. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes no parameters, and returns a String (the logical outcome) which is passed to the NavigationHandler for this application.

variable.name: action
variable.description: MethodBinding representing the application action to invoke when this component is activated by the user. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes no parameters, and returns a String (the logical outcome) which is passed to the NavigationHandler for this application.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: var
variable.description: Name of a request-scope attribute under which the model data for the row selected by the current value of the "rowIndex" property (i.e. also the current value of the "rowData" property) will be exposed.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: url
variable.description: Context-relative URL to retrieve the resource associated with this component. This is an alias for the "value" property.

variable.name: alt
variable.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: required
variable.description: Flag indicating that the user is required to provide a submitted value for this input component.

variable.name: redisplay
variable.description: Flag indicating that any existing value in this field should be rendered when the form is created. Because this is a potential security risk, password values are not displayed by default.

variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: required
variable.description: Flag indicating that the user is required to provide a submitted value for this input component.

variable.name: size
variable.description: The number of characters used to determine the width of this field.

variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: rows
variable.description: The number of rows to be displayed.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: cols
variable.description: The number of columns to be displayed.

variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: for
variable.description: Client identifier of the component for which to display messages.

variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: rendered
variable.description: Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

variable.name: for
variable.description: Client identifier of the component for which this element is a label.

variable.name: binding
variable.description: The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean.

variable.name: value
variable.description: The current value of this component.

variable.name: columns
variable.description: The number of columns to render before starting a new row.

variable.name: rendered
variable.description: Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

variable.name: id
variable.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

variable.name: binding
variable.description: The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean.

variable.name: layout
variable.description: Orientation of the options list to be created. Valid values are "pageDirection" (list is laid out vertically), or "lineDirection" (list is laid out horizontally). If not specified, the default value is "lineDirection".
